dct_description_sm: This polygon shapefile represents population counts and associated households by municipality in Mexico, including age, sex, education, and birthplace of the population, among other data. Source data were gathered by more than 106,000 interviewers who traveled across Mexico to visit each dwelling and ask questions of the occupants. Municipal zones delimitation based on cartography geostatistics was used to input this data into a GIS system.
These data are intended for geographic display and analysis at the municipal level. No responsibility is assumed by the Instituto Nacional de Estadistica y Geografia or LeadDog Consulting.
dct_rights_sm: These data are licensed by Stanford Libraries and are available to Stanford University affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students. Non affiliates seeking access should contact the publisher directly. These data may not be reproduced or used for any purpose without permission.
